backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor representing a placeholder backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and tests for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing concise summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style sheet defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/branding/QRCodeB: Renders a QR code using an SVG matrix inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Simple reusable component for page and section headers with optional subtitle.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with brand info, navigation links, contact details, social links, and dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo, navigation, mobile sheet menu, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Provides page layout structure with header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaLight: Displays a modal lightbox showing a selected image or video with title and category info.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaStrip: Renders up to four media items for a given category or a placeholder message if none exist.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Shows a service card with title, description, features, and a related MediaStrip.
frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts: Defines the GalleryItem type and exports an empty media list for gallery content.
frontend/src/content/qrMatrix.ts: Exports a static numeric matrix representing a QR code.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service data and additional offerings for the services section.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Provides company branding text and contact information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth handling, providing login, logout, and identity state via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables, themes, and utility classes including gold accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the company's offerings and mission.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact methods including email, location, and phone numbers in styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays filterable gallery of images and videos by category and shows selected items in a lightbox.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, contact info, and early services preview.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows all main service sections and a grid of additional offerings using shared service data.
frontend/src/pages/VisionMissionPage.tsx: Presents the companyâ€™s vision and mission in two styled card components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme with custom colors, fonts, animations, and component styling extensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, features, image needs, and architectural notes for the website build.
